headline: ON Semiconductor Corporation (ON): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on ON Semiconductor Corporation on X.com by @MoneyShow. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ON. ON Semiconductor Corporation’s share was trading at $69.68 as of February 25th. ON’s trailing and forward P/E were 46.42 and 17.01, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. ON Semiconductor Corporation provides intelligent sensing and […]

headline: ON Semiconductor Refocuses On Higher Margin Growth And Cash Generation
summary: ON Semiconductor (NasdaqGS:ON) is shifting capital and resources toward higher margin segments such as silicon carbide and AI data center power solutions. The company is tightening capital discipline and prioritizing projects that target stronger returns on investment. This repositioning comes as demand cools in core markets including electric vehicles and smartphones. ON Semiconductor, a key supplier of power and sensing chips, is recalibrating its business mix as parts of the automotive...
